Name: Name Change, Russell D. Ramsey Memorial Triangle, Brooklyn
Title: A Local Law in relation to a triangle name, Russell D. Ramsey Memorial Triangle, Borough of Brooklyn.
BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

History.BodyName: Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations
Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs, and International Intergroup Relations

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

    	Section 1.  The following triangle name is hereby designated as hereafter indicated.

_____________________________________________________________ 
New name 	    	    	Present name  		Limits
_____________________________________________________________

Russell D. Ramsey  	    		None	    		an existing triangle
Memorial Triangle						located on the south side of Empire Boulevard at the intersection of Empire Boulevard and Washington Avenue



    	ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.


    	Referred to the Committee on Parks, Recreation, Cultural Affairs & International Intergroup Relations.





TNN/tnn
LS# 4603
07/23/97
